QuestData.Title: Optimistic Mystic
QuestData.Description:
I'm sure I can find this Bovan Windtotem--but I will need a few items from you.
First, I need a selection of flowers that grow at the base of the springs. They have the specific properties we are looking for.
Next, I require the heart of a salamanther. A stronger heart will better our chances--look for the strongest you can find!
I can gather the rest of the materials on my own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Strong Salamanther Heart and $2oa Geyser Flowers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Boku just north of the Ohn'iri Springs.
